name: backend_na
description: - Project Name: Bank Details - Team: Nuraly and Amir A. - Goal: Creation of a low-quality banking interface replica for development study. - Content: Focused on general account details, not real confidential data. - Next Steps: Week 2 → form + POST route, Week 3 → database, etc. - Setup: In the project's directory there is .msi file, that installing node and npm automatically. Run it and follow the instructions.
